Brooklyn College, Brooklyn, NY

1961
Biology
Downstate Medical College, S.U.N.Y.
M.D.
1965
Medicine
WORK EXPERIENCE
1971-1972 Associate in Medicine, DUMC, Durham, NC
1972-1976 Assistant Professor of Medicine, DUMC, Durham, NC
1973-1975 Veterans Administration Clinical Investigator, Durham, NC
1975-1976 Chief, Hematology-Oncology Section, VAMC, Durham, NC
1975-1987 Principal Investigator, Southeastern Cancer Study Group, DUMC Associate Professor of Medicine, DUMC, Durham, NC
Chief, Medical Services, VAMC, Durham, NC
1976-1982 1976-1986 Chairman, Myeloma Committee, Southeastern Cancer Study Group Director, Geriatric Fellowship Program, VAMC, Durham, NC
1976-1980
1978-present 1980 Acting Associate Chief of Staff/Research, VAMC, Durham, NC
1980-present Professor of Medicine, DUMC, Durham, NC
1982 Acting Associate Chief of Staff/Research, VAMC, Durham, NC
Associate Chief of Staff/Education, VAMC, Durham, NC
1982-1984 1982-present Director, Center for the Study of Aging and Human Development and Division of Geriatric Medicine, DUMC, Durham, NC
1984-present Director, Geriatric Research Education Clinical Center (GRECC), VAMC
1990-present Associate Chief of Staff for Geriatrics & Extended Care, VAMC, Durham, NC
HONORS
1984 Fellow of the American Geriatrics Society 1986 Fellow of the Clinical Medicine Section of the Gerontological Society of America (GSA)
RECENT SELECTED PUBLICATIONS (FROM A TOTAL OF 130) Cohen, H.J., Bernstein, R.J., and Grufferman, S .: The Role of Immune Stimulation in the Etiology of Multiple Myeloma. American Journal of Hematology 24:119-126, 1987. Cohen, H. J., Cox, E., Manton, K., and Woodbury, M .: Maligant Melanoma in the Elderly Journal of Clinical Oncology 5:100-106, 1987.
Crawford, J., Eye, M.K., and Cohen, H.J .: The Evaluation of Monoclonal Gammopathies in the Well Elderly. American Journal of Medicine 82:39-45, 1987.
DeMaria, L.C. and Cohen, H.J .: Characteristics of Lung Cancer in the Elderly. Journal of Gerontology 42:540-545, 1987.
Cohen, H.J .: Monoclonal Gammopathies and Aging. Hospital Practice 23(3A) :75-100, 1988. Jurivich, D.A., Rosen, G.M., and Cohen, H.J .: Membrane Protein Organization of
Peripheral Blood Lymphocytes from Healthy Young and Aged Adults. Mechanisms of Ageing and Development 45:65-74, 1988.
Robertson, S.J., Grufferman, S., and Cohen, H.J .: Hospital Versus Random Digit Dialing Controls in the Elderly: Observations from Two Case-control Studies. Journal of American Geriatrics Society 36:119-123, 1988.
